arm_group.description: Cisplatin plus Gemcitabine for 3 cycles followed by Cisplatin, radiotherapy and brachytherapy

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this phase II study is to determine the survival free disease of patients
      diagnosed with invasive locally advanced carcinomas of uterine cervix treated with induction
      chemotherapy with cisplatin and gemcitabine followed by chemoradiation and definitive
      chemoradiation.

clinical_study.brief_title: Non-comparative Study of Treatment With Induction Chemotherapy With Cisplatin and Gemcitabine Followed by Chemoradiation or Definitive Chemoradiation in Invasive Locally Advanced Carcinomas of Uterine Cervix.
clinical_study.condition: Patients Diagnosed With Advanced Carcinoma of Uterine Cervix t

intervention.description: Cisplatin 40 mg/m2 on day 1, day8, day15, day22, day 36 of radiotherapy period.

contact.last_name: Maria Del Pilar Estevez Diz, MD

clinical_study.official_title: Phase II, Prospective, Randomized, Non-comparative Study of Treatment With Induction Chemotherapy With Cisplatin and Gemcitabine Followed by Chemoradiation or Definitive Chemoradiation in Invasive Locally Advanced Carcinomas of Uterine Cervix.
